Field Detail

SVG_NAMESPACE

static final String SVG_NAMESPACE
The XML namespace used for SVG documents. See http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/attindex.html, xmlns attribute

See Also:
Constant Field Values

XLINK_NAMESPACE

static final String XLINK_NAMESPACE
The XML namespace used for internal or external links in SVG documents. See http://www.w3.org/TR/SVG11/attindex.html, xmlns:xlink attribute

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SVG_VERSION

static final String SVG_VERSION
The version of SVG we use. We use the latest released version of the specification as of April 2010.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

renderSVGDocument

void renderSVGDocument(OutputStream outputStream)
Parameters:
outputStream - The specified OutputStream instance the SVG XML data should be written to.

getSVGDocument

String getSVGDocument()
Returns:
The SVG XML content is returned as one big String

storeSVGDocument

void storeSVGDocument(File file)
                      throws FileNotFoundException
Parameters:
file - The File object specified will be truncated and the SVG XML content will be written into the file.
Throws:
FileNotFoundException - If the filename the File object points to is not writable for some reason this exception will be thrown (see FileOutputStream constructor for more info).

setPrettyPrint

void setPrettyPrint(boolean b)
Parameters:
b - Output XML that is more human-readable if this is true. Default should be false.
